title: Average Speed Calculation
problem: A train travels 60 km/h for 1.5 hours and then 90 km/h for 2 hours. What is the average speed for the entire journey?
expected_reasoning: Calculate distance for first segment: 60 km/h × 1.5 h = 90 km
Calculate distance for second segment: 90 km/h × 2 h = 180 km
Average speed: 270 km ÷ 3.5 h = 77.14 km/h ≈ 81 km/h
